name: Data Analyst
description:
We are an innovative FinTech start-up with the goal to provide the best product for those who want to manage their finances in a smart way combining all financial services our customers need within a single application. We are currently live in several European countries with 3 products: daily banking, Investments, and Crypto and are constantly expanding and enhancing our product offering.

We are all about flat organizational structure, transparency, adopting a decentralized approach to decision-making, and collaboration. Here, every employee can have an impact and have the unique chance to launch a new product on modern technologies, bring your ideas which will later be used by millions of customers. We highly value honesty, transparency, customer obsession, and instability in face of difficulties.

We are looking for a passionate Data Analyst for the Customer Care and Operations team and Daily Banking team. The successful candidate will turn data into information, information into insight, and insight into business decisions.

What you'll do:

  • Provide analytical support to Customer Care and Banking stakeholders

  • Formulate hypotheses for root cause analysis related to customer support issues and customer contacts

  • Collecting data through analyzing business results or by setting up and managing new studies

  • Transferring data into formats appropriate for analysis

  • Searching through large data sets for usable information

  • Create reports and dashboards for operational management

  • Ad hoc research

What you'll need in order to be successful:

  • Bachelor's degree minimum, Master's degree preferred. Degrees related to technical, mathematics, and statistics fields are most appropriate

  • Minimum 1 year or more experience in a similar role

  • Have experience with SQL and Python

  • Are able to quickly assemble a working model in Excel and Google Sheets, conduct analytical work, assemble a control panel or presentation

  • Know probability theory and mathematical statistics

  • Are an excellent communicator with the ability to clearly make sense of complex ideas, have a passion for analytics and data

  • Are ready to communicate with business and BI teams, also to initiate this communication, to monitor the implementation of tasks

Our offer:

  • Work in a brand new office in Moscow (Dinamo). Remote work is possible
  • Opportunity to participate in the creation of a new and innovative company

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary and bonuses
  • Flexible workload
  • Free lunch and fruits
  • Healthcare benefits
  • Sport
  • Language courses
  • Lifelong learning
